resources.string:
The object of the game is to get a connect of escape the sewers! It is your job to make sure the spooky creatures are safely moved to the Ghost Containment Facility. 

 Take turns placing GCP (ghost containment pipes) on to the gameboard by dragging a GCP from your dock to the board and pressing INSTALL. 

 If you do not have a use for a GCP, you can select it and hit the DISCARD button to have a new pipe your next turn. 

 If you feel overwhelmed by the spectral beings, you can hit the forfeit button on your turn. 

 Once you have a safely sealed connection to the Ghost Containment Facility, press the OPEN button to start the flow of ghosts. But be careful! If there are any leaks in your system the ghosts will escape and you will lose! 

 Good luck! The City of East Lansing is counting on you!
